doc.field: CFF TO ISSUE 500 MLN FRANCS BONDS

- Credit Foncier de France said it will issue on Wednesday around 500 mln francs worth of Specialised Financial Institution Bonds (BIFS). This second issue of eight pct BIFS, maturing on December 23, 1993, are identical to the 535 mln franc issue of bonds issued last month. BIFS, created in December 1985 and reserved for issue by certain specialised financial bodies, are negotiable securities with a life of between two and five years and are issued in units of five mln francs. At the end of February there was a total of 3.9 billion francs in BIFS in circulation.
